revision.text: Possibly: Tracts in Controversy with Dr. Priestley upon the historical question of the belief of the first ages in our Lord's divinity. Originally published in the years, 1783, 1784, and 1786. Now revised and augmented with a large addition of notes, and supplemental disquisitions, by the author, Samuel, Lord Bishop of St. David's. (Samuel Horsley). (Glocester : Printed by R. Raikes, for J. Robson and Co. New Bond-Street, London, M. DCC. LXXXIX. [1789]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2409359~S1
